name: Fair Islands VR
description: The all-in-one mini-games bundle. Discover a variety of VR mechanisms in a relaxing and colorful environment. Collect items and proudly place them in your personal house that can be visited by your friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 200 MB available space
